price: (8) That He should establish the truth and abolish falsehood, even if the criminals disliked it.
arabic: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: liyuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa wayub'ṭila al-bāṭila walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
